title: Not showing notifications, settings search is gone, 'Developer Options not available for this user'
content:
While using the phone my battery drained and switched off. When I switched it on again, my phone had a different wallpaper, notifications are not shown anymore, you can't search in settings anymore, if you go to developer options you see a screen with this message: "Developer Options not available for this user"

I was reading in internet in seems to be a common issue I tried to do what it's suggested in some forums like this:

https://forums.androidcentral.com/samsung-galaxy-s7/659407-s7-edge-not-showing-notifications-tray-recent-apps-button-settings-button-dnt-work-2.html

But nothing seems to work. 

I would really appreciate some support! 
Thank you very much
